mapper.select: select ID,TITLE,CREATETIME,TYPE_ID,TYPE_NAME,STATUS from QL_SUPPLY where DISABLED='false' ORDER BY CREATETIME DESC
mapper.update: update QL_SUPPLY set VIEWNUM = #{viewnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} WHERE ID=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select COUNT("ID") from QL_SUPPLY where DISABLED = 'false' and USER_ID = #{userId}
and to_char(CREATETIME,'YYYY-MM-DD')=to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')
and to_char(CREATETIME,'YYYY-MM-DD')= to_char(SYSDATE-1,'YYYY-MM-DD')
and to_char(CREATETIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_char(SYSDATE-3,'YYYY-MM-DD')
and to_char(CREATETIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_char(SYSDATE-7,'YYYY-MM-DD')
and to_char(CREATETIME,'YYYY-MM')=to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM')
and to_char(CREATETIME,'YYYY')=to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY')
